name: Catformer (sloths5)
description:
*Made for the ct.js  game jam*

A very low-quality game made of stock images and memes that are poorly cropped.

You are a cat. Go to the door. Avoid the saws and consume that OREO

Controls:

W / Up arrow / Space - Jump

A / Left arrow - Walk Left

D / Right arrow - Walk Right

Sorry that it's really bad, but it's my first time making a game and I did it in 2 days with a fractured elbow.
